tool_description: Send and receive messages from WhatsApp via QR Code is a simple and yet powerful endpoint that allows you to creates an extensive range of QR formats for a wide range of applications such as Text, URL, WhatsApp, WiFi Access, Bitcoin Address, Giroconto, and many more in various image formats, SVG, and ASCII.
name: Whatsapp QR
title: Whatsapp QR

api_list.name: WhatsApp QR Code Image_copy
api_list.description: This end point  takes a 'GET' request with URL / strings as parameter and returns WhatsApp QR Code Image.
